long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GambleOff 1.2(beta)**

GambleOff is your go-to extension for blocking access to gambling websites, helping you stay focused and maintain a healthier browsing experience. Whether you're trying to break a gambling habit or just want to avoid distractions, GambleOff ensures these sites are out of reach with just a click of a button.

**What's New in Version 1.2(beta)**

- **Enhanced User Interface**: We have redesigned the interface to be more visually appealing and user-friendly. The interface now features a colorful and modern design to make your experience more pleasant.
- **On/Off Toggle Buttons**: Easily enable or disable the blocker with our new intuitive toggle buttons. The buttons are now centered and have a responsive design to ensure seamless interaction.
- **Glowing Effect**: The "GambleOff" title now has a subtle glow effect to highlight the extension's name, making it stand out and easy to locate.
- **Font Update**: We've updated the font to "Outfit" for a clean and modern look, and made the title bold for better visibility.
- **Buy Me a Coffee**: Added a "Buy Me a Coffee" button for those who wish to support the development of this extension. Your support helps us improve and maintain GambleOff.
- **Additional Sites Blocked**: Expanded the list of gambling websites that are blocked, including new popular sites to ensure a comprehensive blocking experience.

**Features**

- Block access to gambling websites with a single click.
- Simple on/off toggle buttons for quick enabling and disabling.
- Stylish and modern interface with a glowing title effect.
- Support the extension development through the "Buy Me a Coffee" button.
- Regular updates to include more gambling sites and improve functionality.

Stay focused and gamble-free with GambleOff! Download now and take control of your browsing experience.

**Privacy and Permissions**

GambleOff requires certain permissions to function effectively. We use `declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess` to block access to specified gambling websites. The `storage` permission is used to save your preferences for enabling or disabling the blocker. No personal data is collected or shared.

Thank you for using GambleOff. Your feedback and support are greatly appreciated!
